name: Shady-Shader
description:
Prototype

This game is only a short unfinished prototype. This was mainly developed to test out a new game mechanic. At this point of time it is unsure, if I'll update the game at any point of time.

Gameplay

Use WSAD to walk around and your mouse to schoot. The projectiles of the gun will create a lightsource on inpact. Use these lightsources to reveal the path. Note that you can only have 2 lightsources at the same time (left and right click). 

Have Fun!
